dc_title_s: Geologic atlas of Mower County, Minnesota, C-11, Part B, Plate 9, Sensitivity to Pollution of the Uppermost Bedrock Aquifers
dc_description_s: Map showing the susceptibility of ground water in the upper most bedrock aquifers to contamination, including the age of the water as determined from radioactive isotopes in the water, scale 1:100,000; 1:200,000, Mower County.
dc_publisher_s: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources, Division of Waters
